spec_data.Name: rubygem-simple-rss
spec_data.Description:
A simple, flexible, extensible, and liberal RSS and Atom reader for Ruby.
It is designed to be backwards compatible with the standard RSS parser, but
will never do RSS generation.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:24:53 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple, flexible, extensible, and liberal RSS and Atom reader for Ruby
